page.title: 09Shopping in N.St Ives
page.content: Our area of North ST.IVES consists of housing estates and fields,but there are a few shops such as the Rainbow which is a large supermarket.This is designed to attract customers from in and outside ST.IVES.The shop needs to attract people from outside ST.IVES as there aren't sufficient customers on our estate to support such a large shop. There are three other main shops in the Rainbow developement.They are a chemist,the newsagents,the Burleigh Bite and the car parts shop,but these are all smaller than the Rainbow. People use these shops when they come to the Rainbow.If the Rainbow wasn't there then the small shops wouldn't have as many customers. One can buy every day goods at these shops but for clothes and furniture one has to travel to the town centre.
